text: Ara isara'ila bansiyadera jan'ya rasula. 'Nihsandeha ami tomadera kache asachi tomadera prabhura kacha theke ekati nidarsana niye, ami abasya'i tomadera jan'ya mati theke tairi kari pakhira mato murti, tarapara tate ami phutkara di'i, takhana seti pakhi haye yaya allahâ€Œra icchaya. Ara ami arogya kari andhake o kustha rugike, ara ami jibana di'i mrtake allahâ€Œra icchaya. Ara ami tomadera khabara di'i yesaba tomara khabe ara ya tomara nijedera barite majuta rakho. Nihsandeha ete bisesa nidarsana ache tomadera jan'ya yadi tomara bisbasi ha'o.
